organic.title: Community Violence Intervention Center
organic.snippet: Offering violence-related safety, healing and education to individuals, families and communities in Grand Forks County.

organic.title: National Domestic Violence Hotline: Domestic Violence Support
organic.snippet: Everyone deserves relationships free from domestic violence. When you're ready, we're here to listen with confidential support 24/7/365.

organic.title: Services for Victims | CVIC - Community Violence Intervention Center
organic.snippet: CVIC offers services to support children, teens/young adults and adults who experience domestic violence, sexual assault, child abuse and more.
